summary: Changes the spell \"Summon Followers\" spell by AeonVita (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26693) into a lesser power and activated like a Voice power (default Z key).
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][size=4]Description[/size][/color]
I like, and use, AeonVita\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26693]Summon Followers[/url] mod, but I didn\'t like that it is a spell. Why? Because sometimes during combat I might need help and my followers are fighting some other mobs somewhere else. Equipping a spell would mean I would lose my shield (if left hand) or unequip my 2-hander which I may be using at that moment. Using the summon as a voice solves this problem. 

Roleplay-wise, isn\'t it more realistic to be yelling \"Help me! Come over here!\" to your followers instead? :) Or if you\'re running in the wilds and your followers get lost, it seems more realistic for you to be yelling \"Hey I\'m over here!\"

Hence, making the summon as a voice power seemed to make more sense.

So, I just changed the spell into a lesser power and you can activate it like any other powers with the Z key (by default if you have not changed it).

[color=red][size=4]Requirements[/size][/color]
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26693]Summon Followers mod[/url]. Choose the version you want, with or without choices

This mod is [u]NOT[/u] a standalone mod!

[color=red][size=4]Update[/size][/color]
AeonVita released an \"alternative\" version which allow you to choose which follower to summon, including those that are waiting or relaxed (sandbox) mode. Thus I have changed his ESP (but not his script) again to use the summon as voice. Please choose only ONE from AeonVita\'s mod and install the corresponding one from here. [u]The 2 do NOT mix and are mutually exclusive![/u]

[color=red][size=4]Installation[/size][/color]
1. Download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26693]AeonVita\'s mod[/url] and install that first.
2. Install mine by overwriting the ESP file in your Skyrim\\Data folder. 

Note - NMM install is [b]**HIGHLY DISCOURAGED**[/b] unless you know exactly how NMM works and answer the right questions when NMM pops those question dialog boxes up (upgrade? Overwrite? Remove? etc).

[color=red][size=4]Credits[/size][/color]
Thanks to AeonVita for creating the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26693]Summon Followers mod[/url].

[color=red][size=4]Permissions[/size][/color]
Please seek permission from AeonVita, not me, if you want to modify his mod.
